meanings.sent1: The soldiers were munitioned before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: The army munitioned the troops with rifles and grenades.
meanings.sent3: The quartermaster munitioned the troops with an abundance of supplies.
meanings.sent4: The rebels munitioned themselves with determination and courage.
meanings.sent5: The act of being munitioned filled the soldiers with confidence.

meanings.sent1: The munitioned tanks rolled into the battlefield.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers stood ready, munitioned for any threat.
meanings.sent3: The munitioned fortress looked imposing against the horizon.
meanings.sent4: The munitioned ship sailed through the rough seas.
meanings.sent5: The munitioned troops advanced cautiously, their gear gleaming in the sun.
